response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am confident it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Given its significance and rarity, I propose a price of $950,000 for the product. I believe this figure strikes a fair balance between acknowledging its true value to you and ensuring a reasonable return for my investment. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 950000}
